snippet: Mr. Rubio has vowed that he would not seek re-election after six years in the Senate, but is reconsidering. With him on the ballot, Republicans have a greater chance of keeping the seat.
abstract: Sen Marco Rubio is seriously considering running for re-election despite previously swearing off any attempt to hold on to his seat; move seems more likely in light of fact Republican Rep David Jolly has dropped out of race.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rubio has vowed that he would not seek re-election after six years in the Senate, but is reconsidering. With him on the ballot, Republicans have a greater chance of keeping the seat.

headline.main: Marco Rubio, Reversing Plans, Is Leaning Toward Running for Senate Again
headline.print_headline: Rubio, Reversing Plans, Is Leaning Toward Running for Senate Again
